Dig into a meal prepared by you and new friends. All net proceeds from this tour will go directly to Seven Women. Visit Seven Women, a social enterprise working to help disadvantaged women in Nepal. Tour a community greenhouse, discover how the produce is grown, and learn the names of vegetables in Nepali. Find out how to make traditional Nepalese dishes passed down over generations. strTitle: Kathmandu: Traditional Cooking Class with a Local
